title: Community Solar Billing Inquiry
description: A customer enrolled in a community solar program is calling to understand the credits on their bill.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's bill and identify the community solar credit line item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the credit on the bill statement.

tasks.description: Retrieve the generation data from the community solar farm for the billing period and the customer's subscription share.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the MWh generated by the customer's share of the farm.

tasks.description: Explain how the bill credit was calculated based on the solar generation and the credit rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly walks the customer through the calculation, resolving their confusion.
